movie_title: Does wearing a uniform change our behaviour? 6 Minute English
introduction: Improve your English vocabulary and speaking with 6 Minute English from the BBC! What's the fascinat

vocabulary.definition: the character you present to the outside world, as opposed to the person you feel like inside
vocabulary.example: My work persona is confident and chatty but I’m actually rather shy.

vocabulary.definition: feeling you can behave however you like
vocabulary.example: Talking openly about your problems can be very liberating.

vocabulary.definition: belong to a particular group and be accepted by them
vocabulary.example: I never fitted in with the cool kids at school.

vocabulary.definition: be noticeable or easy to see
vocabulary.example: My colourful suit really stood out at the party.
Does this pilot’s uniform suit me, Neil?

vocabulary.definition: test something to decide whether you want it or not
vocabulary.example: Our listeners can try these new vocabulary items on for size – and decide whether they’ll be useful or not.
